feature_model.name: MobileMedia_Conejero

meta.data: Adaptation of the MobileMedia system. MobileMedia is a product line system built to allow the user of a mobile device to perform different operations, such as visualizing photos, playing music or videos and sending photos via SMS

feature_model.feature_tree: :r MobileMedia(_r) :m AlbumManagement(_r_1) :m CreateAlbum(_r_1_2) :m DeleteAlbum(_r_1_3) :m ViewAlbum(_r_1_4) :m MediaManagement(_r_5) :o Favourites(_r_5_6) :m SetFavourites(_r_5_6_7) :m ViewFavourites(_r_5_6_8) :o Sorting(_r_5_9) :m BasicMediaOperations(_r_5_10) :m CreateMedia(_r_5_10_11) :m DeleteMedia(_r_5_10_12) :o EditMediaLabel(_r_5_10_13) :o CopyMedia(_r_5_15) :o SMSTransfer(_r_5_16) :m ReceivePhoto(_r_5_16_17) :m SendPhoto(_r_5_16_18) :m MediaSelection(_r_19) :o Photo(_r_19_20) :m ViewPhoto(_r_19_20_22) :o Music(_r_19_21) :m PlayMusic(_r_19_21_23) :o Video(_r_19_24) :m PlayVideo(_r_19_24_25)
